issues.description: The problem statement explicitly requires that "Every class/interface has to be declared public" (problem_statement.md), and the UML declares the Pneumatic interface. In the solution repository the Pneumatic interface is declared without the public modifier (package-private). This contradicts the explicit requirement and will confuse students comparing their (public) implementations with the reference solution or when inspecting the provided solution code.
issues.suggested_fix: Declare the Pneumatic interface as public in the solution (and, if present, in the template) to match the problem statement requirement. Change the interface declaration to: public interface Pneumatic { void raisePressure(int pressureIncrease); void openValve(); }
